## Installation

You can install the development version of IPCWJK like so:

``` r
# With remotes
remotes::install_github("IDEN-Project-UAS-Darmstadt/IPCWJK")
# With pak (recommended for speed)
pak::pkg_install("IDEN-Project-UAS-Darmstadt/IPCWJK")
```
